name: Jumbbubble
description:
Jumbbubble is a 2D platformer game where you're a cool ninja, that can turn into a shuriken, to kill evil bubbles and avoid obstacles.

Controls
AD or Arrows - Move
Space, Z, W - JumpLeft Mouse - Shoot shurikenRightAlt - Restart the room

If playing on the browser, I recommend playing on fullscreen.

Source Code

Pixel art made by: Tio Torugo and Gabriel M

Music: Jeremy Blake
